headline.main: Jackets' Bobrovsky Makes 20 Saves in Second Straight Shutout
headline.print_headline: Jackets' Bobrovsky Makes 20 Saves in Second Straight Shutout

lead_paragraph: Sergei Bobrovsky is having one of those years goaltenders dream about, and it is making the Columbus Blue Jackets a team to fear when the playoffs start next month.
snippet: Sergei Bobrovsky is having one of those years goaltenders dream about, and it is making the Columbus Blue Jackets a team to fear when the playoffs start next month....
